member.name: T:Servers.GasPressureController
member.summary: Controller for managing gas pressure operations via REST, backed by RPC communication.

member.name: M:Servers.GasPressureController.IncreaseMass(System.Double)
member.summary: Adds mass to the gas container.
member.param: The amount of mass to add.

member.name: M:Servers.GasPressureController.DecreaseMass(System.Double)
member.summary: Removes mass from the gas container.
member.param: The amount of mass to remove.

member.name: M:Servers.GasPressureController.GetPressure
member.summary: Retrieves the current pressure of the gas container.
member.returns: The current pressure as a double value.

member.name: M:Servers.GasPressureController.IsContainerDestroyed
member.summary: Checks if the gas container is destroyed.
member.returns: True if the container is destroyed; otherwise, false.
